channel.title: About on Code Strokes
channel.description: Recent content in About on Code Strokes

item.title: Welcome to Code Strokes
item.description: Welcome to Code Strokes.  Our focus here is about elegant software design.  We attempt to meld the worlds of deeply embedded real-time software, with modern software design principles.  Take a look at our features. If you have any feedback leave a comment. Thank you, and welcome.
